scripts.build:ui: cd packages/ui-core && cross-env VITE_BUILD_TARGET=juce npx vite build
scripts.build:ui:showcase: cd packages/ui-core && cross-env VITE_PRODUCT=showcase cross-env VITE_BUILD_TARGET=juce npx vite build
scripts.dev:ui:showcase: cd packages/ui-core && cross-env VITE_PRODUCT=showcase npx vite
scripts.release:unity: npm run build:dsp && npm run build:ui && npm run configure:plugin:unity && npm run build:plugin
scripts.release:unity:showcase: npm run build:dsp:showcase && npm run build:ui:showcase && npm run configure:plugin:unity && npm run build:plugin
scripts.release:vst: npm run build:dsp && npm run build:ui && npm run build:plugin
scripts.release:vst:showcase: npm run build:dsp:showcase && npm run build:ui:showcase && npm run build:plugin
scripts.test:dsp: cross-env MOONVST_PRODUCT=template node scripts/select-product.js --product template && cd build/dsp-active && moon test
scripts.test:dsp:showcase: cross-env MOONVST_PRODUCT=showcase node scripts/select-product.js --product showcase && cd build/dsp-active && moon test
